objects.text:
• Premium unisex eau de toilette
• Fresh & invigorating scent profile
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size

product_details.name: BELLAVITA Fresh Unisex EDT - Invigorating Luxury Fragrance for All
product_details.description:
• Premium unisex eau de toilette suitable for all genders
• Generous 100ml/3.4 fl. oz size for long-lasting use
• Sleek turquoise bottle design with luxurious gold cap
• Fresh and invigorating scent profile perfect for daily wear
• Modern and sophisticated packaging ideal for gifting
• Professional-grade fragrance from BELLAVITA's luxury collection
• Versatile scent suitable for both day and evening wear
• Travel-friendly size that meets international flight regulations
• Premium quality EDT concentration for optimal longevity
• Contemporary unisex fragrance that breaks traditional boundaries

banner_details:
This banner design is split into two vertical halves – the left side features promotional text on a dark gradient background, while the right side showcases a product image on a teal-toned gradient background. The **heading** text is bold and white, emphasizing an exclusive offer. Below it, the **subheading** highlights the product name in a serif gold tone. The **description** lists key features in bullet points in white, followed by a bold **tagline** encouraging urgency. A large **price** display uses a digital-style font in gold, paired with a **call-to-action (cta)** button layered over a gold **cta_background**. The right side features a high-resolution **product_image** with a glowing effect. 

**Color Palette:**
- Teal: #12B5B0, #09867E
- Deep Green: #1a3c40, #0d2628
- Gold: #E0C080
- White: #FFFFFF
- CTA Text: #1a3c40
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern design with a vibrant turquoise bottle and a metallic gold cap. The primary color, turquoise (#00B8B8), symbolizes freshness and energy, perfect for a unisex fragrance. The cap is a reflective champagne gold (#D4AF37), adding a luxurious contrast and elevating the premium feel. The white typography (#FFFFFF) stands out clearly against the bold background, maintaining readability and visual appeal. These colors blend harmoniously—turquoise offers a spirited base, gold adds richness, and white provides balance. For a banner, a refreshing tropical or ocean-themed palette using these colors will effectively highlight the product’s clean, invigorating nature.
